Title: 8BIT
Subject: The intersections of video games , art , and music

Title: Chasing Ghosts : Beyond the Arcade
Subject: The golden age of video arcade games

Title: The King of Kong : A Fistful of Quarters
Subject: The rivalry between Billy Mitchell and Steve Wiebe over the Donkey Kong record high score

Title: Second Skin
Subject: Follows seven people through the world of MMORPGs

Title: Ecstasy of Order : The Tetris Masters
Subject: A documentary following world-record holding Tetris players as they prepare for the 2010 Tetris Championships

Title: Indie Game : The Movie
Subject: Documentary about the struggles of independent game developers Edmund McMillen and Tommy Refenes during the development of Super Meat Boy , Phil Fish during the development of Fez , and also Jonathan Blow , who reflects on the success of Braid

Title: Thank You for Playing
Subject: Follows the creation of the art-house video game That Dragon , Cancer

Title: Moleman 4 - Longplay
Subject: A documentary which recounts the so far little-known story of the beginnings of video game development behind the Iron Curtain . Outfoxed Nintendo , surprised Commodore engineers , The Last Ninja story , a games software outfit that dodged the limelight and led the world
